channel.title: #142: Revisiting our pre-pandemic yearly goals
channel.description:
@freyfogle and I revisit the goals we made in January 2020. We consider what progress we’ve made despite the current massive global uncertainty.
Back in January, in episode #124, [Ed and Steve stated their goals for 2020](https://bootstrapped.fm/124-goals-for-2020/). Then COVID-19 happened, changing many of the assumptions we had when we made those goals.
<iframe height="200px" width="100%" frameborder="no" scrolling="no" seamless src="https://player.simplecast.com/bcb05258-40ad-4b45-9fc7-d7ce25291a00?dark=false"></iframe>
[You can also listen to and download this episode here](https://bootstrapped.fm/142-revisiting-our-pre-pandemic-yearly-goals/).
